name: Rojelab Android
title: Android
summary: The biggest makeup application and beauty, designed for Rojelab website that one of most famous and largest makeup and beauty company in Iran.
explain:
This app designed for Rojelab website that one of most famous and largest makeup and beauty company in Iran.

some feature of app : 

- activation and login user with sms

- download and view videos online

- create and manage user profile

- create and edit user post

- like or comment posts

- conversation and send or recieve attached file with company experts

- create journal and follow users
